title: Paul Jackson
text:
303.889.9672 • paulr.jackson@proton.me • Remote / Denver, CO • linkedin.com/in/paulthegeek



A highly empathetic team builder with a strong customer-centric mindset. I am seeking a position with a group of people who are committed to delivering excellent software that is accessible to everyone and who bring diverse perspectives to our work.



I have experience leading teams of software engineers and designers to deliver on quarterly OKR goals. The work to achieve these goals included writing software, working with stakeholders to define and prioritize work to ensure that we are delivering value to our customers and meeting our goals, and reporting on team status on a bi-weekly basis. I have experience defining and working to improve agile processes for teams which included leading several of the meetings and tasks required in that defined process. I have been a representative for crucial partner meetings, participated in hiring and onboarding new team members, and have been a mentor to junior team members.



Agile processes • Team communication • Time management and working independently • Programming • Problem solving • Learning new languages and technologies



Project management • Agile Methodologies and Practices • VueJS • ReactJS • EmberJS • Javascript • HTML • CSS • Ruby • Ruby on Rails • SQL • Git



Leading development teams to deliver on quarterly OKR goals
Defining and building a new agile process for development teams
Planning and building green field projects which include a new subscription and billing service the Posit Cloud Product, improving and building internal tooling and integrating tools to better support Posit products, a direct to consumer focus health insurance web app for Aetna, a new landing page for Travis CI



Posit / RStudio • Remote • Software Engineer • February 2020 - July 2023
Travis CI • Remote • Software Engineer • January 2018 - March 2019
Levels Beyond • Denver, CO • Software Engineer • June 2016 - August 2017
Thoughtbot • Denver, CO • Software Engineer • November 2015 - April 2016
iTriage • Denver, CO • Software Engineer • August 2012 - November 2015
